pages.text: I don't need any special equipment to gather plants and stones, so I can start by grabbing those. If I want to do any mining, I'll need to make a pickaxe first. I'm sure more valuable resources can be found deep underground, but I should be well-prepared before venturing there.
While exploring the surface, I occasionally found small gardens with a variety of crops. I will be able to grow many different types of food by collecting these.
